wikipedia_page.main: Carl Hepple is a British multi-sport Paralympic athlete. In the 1960 Summer Paralympics he competed in multiple sports including archery, athletics and wheelchair basketball. In the 1980s, Carl also competed in shooting. In 1968, he was part of the British men's wheelchair basketball team which finished third.
